title: Hello World
content: Hello, My name is Christopher EnyTC. I'm a Back-End Developer and working with JavaScript/Node.js, Python, Ruby and PHP. I have 20 years and am passionate about programming and innovative technologies. I spend my day listening to music, studying something interesting or working on some open-source project. In this blog I will be passing all they know and things of day to day life of a programmer. I'm currently working on a project called Ully and also write articles for DevCenter. I love Javascript/NodeJS, Python, Ruby, Erlang and Go. I'm an enthusiast NoSQL, especially MongoDB and RedisDB. Welcome to my world.
